channel.title: Getting back into RSPS
channel.description:
I'm wanting to get back into RSPS, but I'm only going to be in it for the money. What would be some requirements to have a good popular server? I have 2.5Gb RAM (I ran fine with 1gb in the past) I know some RSPS stuff (placing items in correct slots, simple commands, etc.) I'm a deltafag.
I would like to know the recommended sources/clients, types (317, 474, 508....), what the server should contain, you get the gist of it.

item.title: Getting back into RSPS
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Mr. Bob, post:5, topic:381536”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=477350.msg3492608#msg3492608 date=1297037910]
Doesn’t matter how good your server is unless you can advertise.
[/quote]This is not good advice.

I wouldn’t spend any time at all on a server if it’s not up to my standards!

Though, only about 3 servers were… and one of them was lead by me.[/quote]You are not like the thousands of other RSPS players. I was told my server was great (features wise) by anyone that logged in, and yet (because I didn’t advertise) I never had more than 15 online (since the sponsored servers)

Read full topic

item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Doesn’t matter how good your server is unless you can advertise.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting back into RSPS
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Bob3 Mr. Bob
item.description:
@Mr_Bob3 wrote:

[ul][]Start with a good, optimized base (or create your own) and optimize in every area you can when adding new content.
[]Make sure the server is being ran on a decent enough machine for the population (2.5GB physical memory is fine if your server is optimized well enough.)
[]The host machine should be mounted on a great internet connection line.
[]Be sure the content is great, nobody wants to experience buggy content!
[]Keep the server online as much as possible. I strongly recommended 24/7!!
[]Create appealing content for your users. Make sure images of the server show a lot of detail (to reduce the amount of images being shown) and also why not include some great graphical or support content!
[*]Get some good advertising if you can - it’ll be worth it![/ul]

Welcome back and good luck!

Read full topic

item.title: Getting back into RSPS
item.dc:creator: @adamknightz adamknightz
item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

To start off, you probably should start a 508+.

I’m not sure of any good ones you can download, though.

You should also always spell everything right. And maybe add a few quests (with words spelled correctly…people like me don’t want to be reading “yah n0w u go 2 varrok nd get a chisel!”)

Read full topic
